yalaNationalPark.title: Yala National Park
yalaNationalPark.description: Explore the diverse wildlife and natural beauty of Yala National Park. Discover the unique ecosystems and witness fascinating flora and fauna.

aboutYalaNationalPark.title: About Yala National Park
aboutYalaNationalPark.description: Yala National Park, located in the southeast of Sri Lanka, is renowned for its rich biodiversity. Spanning a vast area, the park is home to various ecosystems, including dense forests, grasslands, and coastal areas.
aboutYalaNationalPark.mainAttractions: Leopard, Elephant, Sloth Bear, and a variety of bird species
